levelCheck.title: Level Check
levelCheck.subtitle: Find out your reading/writing and speaking levels
levelCheck.selectLang.title: Which language are you learning?
levelCheck.selectMode.title: What would you like to assess?
levelCheck.selectMode.subtitle: You can do both for a complete picture
levelCheck.quitConfirm: Are you sure you want to quit? Your progress will be lost.
levelCheck.warning: If you quit midway, you'll need to start over. Please begin when you have enough time.
levelCheck.loginForAccuracy: Log in for more accurate AI-powered assessment
levelCheck.monthlyLimit: You've already taken the assessment this month. Standard analysis will be used.
levelCheck.question: Question
levelCheck.transition.title: Reading Assessment Complete!
listening.listenFirst: Listen to the audio first, then answer the question
voice.notSupported.title: Voice Assessment Not Supported
voice.notSupported.desc: Your browser doesn't support voice recognition. Please try Chrome, Edge, or Safari.
voice.tooShort: Your response is too short. Please record a longer answer.
results.title: Assessment Complete!
results.subtitle: Here's what we found
results.skillGap: Your reading/writing and speaking levels are different ‚Äî this is totally normal! Many learners have stronger skills in one area.
results.fallbackNotice: Note: The speaking assessment used simplified analysis because the AI service was unavailable. Results may be less precise than usual.
results.personalizeBtn: Get personalized recommendations based on your interests
results.comingSoonSub: Join our community to get notified.
results.levels.english.starter.desc: You're just getting started! Focus on basic vocabulary and simple phrases.
results.levels.english.starter.goal: Learn greetings, numbers, and basic sentence patterns (A1)
results.levels.english.A1.desc: Beginner ‚Äî You can understand and use familiar everyday expressions and very basic phrases.
results.levels.english.A1.goal: Build vocabulary for daily routines and simple conversations (A2)
results.levels.english.A2.desc: Elementary ‚Äî You can communicate in simple, routine tasks and describe your background.
results.levels.english.A2.goal: Practice expressing opinions and telling stories (B1)
results.levels.english.B1.desc: Intermediate ‚Äî You can deal with most situations while traveling and describe experiences and events.
results.levels.english.B1.goal: Work on fluency, idioms, and discussing abstract topics (B2)
results.levels.english.B2.desc: Upper Intermediate ‚Äî You can interact with a degree of fluency and spontaneity with native speakers.
results.levels.english.B2.goal: Refine nuance, formal register, and academic/professional English (C1)
results.levels.english.C1.desc: Advanced ‚Äî You can express yourself fluently and spontaneously, using language flexibly for social, academic, and professional purposes.
results.levels.english.C1.goal: Maintain and deepen through native-level content and discussions
results.levels.japanese.starter.desc: You're just getting started! Focus on hiragana, katakana, and basic phrases.
results.levels.japanese.starter.goal: Master hiragana/katakana and learn basic greetings (N5)
results.levels.japanese.N5.desc: Beginner ‚Äî You can read and understand typical expressions written in hiragana, katakana, and basic kanji.
results.levels.japanese.N5.goal: Learn basic grammar patterns and everyday vocabulary (N4)
results.levels.japanese.N4.desc: Elementary ‚Äî You can understand basic Japanese used in everyday situations.
results.levels.japanese.N4.goal: Practice reading short passages and expressing opinions (N3)
results.levels.japanese.N3.desc: Intermediate ‚Äî You can understand Japanese used in everyday situations to a certain degree.
results.levels.japanese.N3.goal: Read news articles and discuss topics with nuance (N2)
results.levels.japanese.N2.desc: Upper Intermediate ‚Äî You can understand Japanese used in a variety of everyday and work situations.
results.levels.japanese.N2.goal: Master formal expressions and complex grammar (N1)
results.levels.japanese.N1.desc: Advanced ‚Äî You can understand Japanese used in a variety of circumstances, including academic and professional contexts.
results.levels.japanese.N1.goal: Maintain through native-level reading and professional communication

resources.japanese.yomujpN5.desc: Level-based readings about Japanese culture, food, and daily life with furigana.
resources.japanese.nhkEasy.desc: Real news written in simple Japanese with audio and furigana support.
resources.japanese.yomujpN3.desc: More complex topics covering society, culture, and current issues.
resources.japanese.yomujpN1.desc: Advanced readings for those approaching native-level comprehension.
resources.english.voaBeginner.desc: Video lessons and news read at a slower pace. Great for building listening skills.
resources.english.esol.desc: Simple reading materials on various topics with exercises.
resources.english.voaIntermediate.desc: News about health, science, technology, and culture at intermediate level.
resources.english.erCentral.desc: Short graded readings with progress tracking features.
resources.english.voaAdvanced.desc: Deep dives into English idioms and expressions.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: From self-study tools to personal coaching ‚Äî find the right support for your learning journey.
services.premium.title: Premium Community
services.premium.desc: Unlock Voice Lounge, AI Workbooks, group coaching, and more. The foundation for serious learners.
services.workbook.title: AI Workbook (Single Purchase)
services.workbook.desc: A personalized 30-day English workbook created by AI, tailored to your interests and level. Delivered as a PDF.
services.coaching.title: First Coaching Session
services.coaching.desc: A 60-minute 1-on-1 session to assess your goals, create a personalized plan, and experience passion-based coaching firsthand.
services.session.title: Single Coaching Session
services.session.desc: A focused 60-minute 1-on-1 coaching session. Requires a completed First Coaching Session.
services.appearance.title: Guest Appearance
services.appearance.desc: Invite me to speak at your event, podcast, or YouTube channel about language learning and passion-based education.
services.seminar.title: Seminar / Workshop
services.seminar.desc: Custom workshops for schools, companies, or communities on language learning, motivation, and cross-cultural communication.
services.personal.title: Personal Coaching (Monthly)
services.personal.desc: Ongoing 1-on-1 monthly coaching with personalized curriculum, weekly check-ins, and unlimited chat support.
services.levelCheck.title: Level Check
services.levelCheck.desc: Take our free AI-powered assessment to discover your reading, listening, and speaking levels.

services.community.desc: Join our free weekly language exchange on Zoom. Japanese and English learners helping each other ‚Äî all levels welcome!

gowm.hero.title: Geek out with Me!
gowm.hero.subtitle: Learn English Through Your Passions
gowm.hero.desc1: Learn English through what you love.
gowm.hero.desc3: And turn it into something real.
gowm.problem.title: Tired of English Subscriptions That Go Nowhere?
gowm.problem.1: Months of online English classes, but no real progress
gowm.problem.2: Spent hundreds of thousands on coaching, but scores didn't improve
gowm.problem.3: Got conversational on a working holiday, but... what's next?
gowm.problem.4: Failed at English many times, but can't give up
gowm.problem.5: Paying every month, but nothing to show for it
gowm.solution.title: It's Not You. It's the Method.
gowm.solution.p1: When it's about something you love, you can keep up ‚Äî even in English.
gowm.solution.p2: Your English ability is tied to your knowledge. In topics you care about, context helps you understand.
gowm.solution.p3: Not memorization ‚Äî stacking "aha!" moments. That's what makes learning stick.
gowm.youtube.title: Watch the Finished Videos
gowm.packages.title: Appearance Packages
gowm.packages.basic.title: Basic
gowm.packages.premium.title: Full Support
gowm.target.title: Who This Is For
gowm.target.1: You've invested heavily in English but haven't seen results
gowm.target.2: You got conversational abroad but don't know what's next
gowm.target.3: You've failed at English before but can't give up
gowm.target.4: Coaching school didn't deliver the results you expected
gowm.target.5: You want to talk about what you love ‚Äî in English
gowm.benefits.title: What You'll Get
gowm.benefits.1.title: Milestone
gowm.benefits.1.desc: A clear goal: your recording date. Deadlines make you serious.
gowm.benefits.2.title: Study Method
gowm.benefits.2.desc: A custom-built learning plan just for you, using the latest AI methods.
gowm.benefits.3.title: Confidence
gowm.benefits.3.desc: The experience of talking about your passion in English.
gowm.benefits.4.title: Video
gowm.benefits.4.desc: A lifelong asset for self-introduction or your portfolio.
gowm.benefits.5.title: Self-Reliance
gowm.benefits.5.desc: Learn how to keep growing with AI ‚Äî even after recording.
gowm.profile.title: About the Instructor
gowm.profile.name: Mochida Sayaka / Yuzupon
gowm.profile.1: 13 years as English instructor, child development supporter
gowm.profile.2: Eiken Grade 1 / TOEIC L&R 925 / Teaching license
gowm.profile.3: 3 years in Australia (working holiday ‚Üí life coach)
gowm.profile.4: Life coaching: 2.5 years of training in Australia, ¬•4M invested
gowm.profile.5: AI x English education: First cohort of AI school, also active as programmer
gowm.profile.6: Creator of 'Learn English Through Your Passions'
gowm.profile.message: I'll go beyond 'I want to get better at English' ‚Äî let's see what's on the other side, together.
gowm.profile.quote1: Do what you want to do NOW. There's no guarantee today's life continues forever. Don't look back later wishing you'd prioritized yourself more.
gowm.profile.quote2: For 10 years, I was the teacher who pushed students hard. Not just feel-good ‚Äî do-good. I'll walk with you until you can actually do it.
gowm.profile.quote3: If you want to speak, talking about what you love builds the most confidence.
gowm.cta.title: Let's Build Your Starting Point ‚Äî Together
gowm.cta.p1: Spend the same money on 3 months with nothing to show,
gowm.cta.p2: or walk away with a lifelong study method and a video.
